018package org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.codebuilders;
019
020import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.FINAL;
021import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.PRIVATE;
022import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.PUBLIC;
023import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
024import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.PropertySpec.PropertyFlag.EXEMPT_FROM_MAP;
025import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.PropertySpec.PropertyFlag.GETTER_ON_MAP;
026import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.CodeBuilder.StandardField.STD_FIELD_ReadLock;
027import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.CodeBuilder.StandardField.STD_FIELD_Registry;
028import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.Primitives.BOOLEAN;
029import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.Primitives.INT;
030import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.Primitives.VOID;
031import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.SuppressableWarnings.SIMPLIFY_STREAM_API_CALL_CHAIN;
032import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.SuppressableWarnings.UNLIKELY_ARG_TYPE;
033import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.SuppressableWarnings.createSuppressWarningsAnnotation;
034import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.nonNull;
035
036import java.util.Collection;
037import java.util.HashSet;
038import java.util.Map;
039import java.util.Set;
040import java.util.TreeMap;
041import java.util.function.Supplier;
042import java.util.stream.Collectors;
043
044import org.apiguardian.api.API;
045import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
046import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.CodeBuilder;
047import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.ClassName;
048import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.ParameterizedTypeName;
049import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.TypeName;
050import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.WildcardTypeName;
051import org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects;
052
053/**
054 *  <p>{@summary The
055 *  {@linkplain CodeBuilder code builder implementation}
056 *  for the generation of the code that let the configuration bean
057 *  implement the interface
058 *  {@link java.util.Map}.}</p>
059 *  <p>More precisely, the configuration bean implements
060 *  <code>Map&lt;String,Object&gt;</code>, although this is not checked by the
061 *  annotation processor.</p>
062 *
063 *  @version $Id: MapImplementor.java 1001 2022-01-29 16:42:15Z tquadrat $
064 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
065 *  @UMLGraph.link
066 *  @since 0.1.0
067 */
068@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: MapImplementor.java 1001 2022-01-29 16:42:15Z tquadrat $" )
069@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
070public final class MapImplementor extends CodeBuilderBase
071{
072        /*--------------*\
073    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
074        \*--------------*/
075    /**
076     *  Creates a new instance of {@code MapImplementor}.
077     *
078     *  @param  context The code generator context.
079     */
080    public MapImplementor( final CodeGeneratorContext context )
081    {
082        super( context );
083    }   //  MapImplementor()
084
085        /*---------*\
086    ====** Methods **==========================================================
087        \*---------*/
088    /**
089     *  {@inheritDoc}
090     */
091    @Override
092    public final void build()
093    {
094        //---* Create the field *----------------------------------------------
095        final var objectType = WildcardTypeName.subtypeOf( Object.class );
096        final var supplierType = ParameterizedTypeName.from( ClassName.from( Supplier.class ), objectType );
097        final var registryType = ParameterizedTypeName.from( ClassName.from( Map.class ), TypeName.from( String.class ), supplierType );
098        final var registry = getComposer().fieldBuilder( registryType, STD_FIELD_Registry.toString(), PRIVATE, FINAL )
099            .addJavadoc(
100                """
101                The shadow map for the properties, used for the implementation of the
102                {@link Map}
103                interface.
104                """ )
105            .initializer( "new $1T<>()", TreeMap.class )
106            .build();
107        addField( STD_FIELD_Registry, registry );
108
109        //---* Create the code for the constructor *---------------------------
110        final var builder = getComposer().codeBlockBuilder()
111            .add( """
112
113                /*
114                 * Initialising the shadow map.
115                 */
116                """ );
117        PropertyLoop:
118        //noinspection ForLoopWithMissingComponent
119        for( final var i = getProperties(); i.hasNext(); )
120        {
121            final var propertySpec = i.next().merge();
122
123            if( propertySpec.hasFlag( EXEMPT_FROM_MAP ) ) continue PropertyLoop;
124
125            //---* Create the supplier and add it to the registry *------------
126            if( !propertySpec.hasFlag( GETTER_ON_MAP ) )
127            {
128                final var field = propertySpec.getFieldName();
129                final var supplier = getComposer().lambdaBuilder()
130                    .addCode( "$1N", field )
131                    .build();
132                builder.addStatement( "$1N.put( $2S, $3L )", registry, propertySpec.getPropertyName(), supplier );
133            }
134            else
135            {
136                propertySpec.getGetterMethodName()
137                    .ifPresent( method -> builder.addStatement( "$1N.put( $2S, this::$3L )", registry, propertySpec.getPropertyName(), method  ) );
138            }
139        }   //  PropertyLoop:
140        addConstructorCode( builder.build() );
141
142        //---* Add the methods from Map *--------------------------------------
143        final var throwException = getComposer().statementOf( "throw new $1T()", UnsupportedOperationException.class );
144        final var inheritDocComment = getComposer().createInheritDocComment();
145        final var lock = isSynchronized()
146             ? getField( STD_FIELD_ReadLock )
147             : null;
148
149        var method = getComposer().methodBuilder( "clear" )
150            .addModifiers( PUBLIC, FINAL )
151            .addAnnotation( Override.class )
152            .returns( VOID )
153            .addJavadoc( inheritDocComment )
154            .addCode( throwException )
155            .build();
156        addMethod( method );
157
158        var arg0 = getComposer().parameterBuilder( Object.class, "key", FINAL )
159            .build();
160        method = getComposer().methodBuilder( "containsKey" )
161            .addModifiers( PUBLIC, FINAL )
162            .addAnnotation( createSuppressWarningsAnnotation( getComposer(), UNLIKELY_ARG_TYPE ) )
163            .addAnnotation( Override.class )
164            .addParameter( arg0 )
165            .returns( BOOLEAN )
166            .addJavadoc( inheritDocComment )
167            .addStatement( "return $1N.containsKey( $2N )", registry, arg0 )
168            .build();
169        addMethod( method );
170
171        arg0 = getComposer().parameterBuilder( Object.class, "value", FINAL )
172            .build();
173        method = getComposer().methodBuilder( "containsValue" )
174            .addModifiers( PUBLIC, FINAL )
175            .addAnnotation( Override.class )
176            .addParameter( arg0 )
177            .returns( BOOLEAN )
178            .addJavadoc( inheritDocComment )
179            .addStatement( "return values().stream().anyMatch( v -> $1T.equals( v, $2N ) )", Objects.class, arg0 )
180            .build();
181        addMethod( method );
182
183        TypeName returnType = ParameterizedTypeName.from( ClassName.from( Set.class ), ParameterizedTypeName.from( Map.Entry.class, String.class, Object.class ) );
184        var methodBuilder = getComposer().methodBuilder( "entrySet" )
185            .addModifiers( PUBLIC, FINAL )
186            .addAnnotation( Override.class )
187            .returns( returnType )
188            .addJavadoc( inheritDocComment )
189            .addStatement( "final $1T retValue = new $2T<>()", returnType, HashSet.class );
190        if( nonNull( lock) ) methodBuilder.beginControlFlow(
191            """
192            try( final var ignored = $N.lock() )
193            """, lock );
194        methodBuilder.beginControlFlow(
195            """
196            for( final var entry : $1N.entrySet() )
197            """, registry )
198            .addStatement( "final var key = entry.getKey()" )
199            .addStatement( "final var value = entry.getValue().get()" )
200            .addStatement( "retValue.add( $1T.entry( key, value ) )", Map.class )
201            .endControlFlow();
202        if( nonNull( lock ) ) methodBuilder.endControlFlow();
203        method = methodBuilder.addCode( getComposer().createReturnStatement() )
204            .build();
205        addMethod( method );
206
207        arg0 = getComposer().parameterBuilder( Object.class, "o", FINAL )
208            .build();
209        method = getComposer().methodBuilder( "equals" )
210            .addModifiers( PUBLIC, FINAL )
211            .addAnnotation( Override.class )
212            .addParameter( arg0 )
213            .returns( BOOLEAN )
214            .addJavadoc( inheritDocComment )
215            .addStatement( "return this == $1N", arg0 )
216            .build();
217        addMethod( method );
218
219        arg0 = getComposer().parameterBuilder( Object.class, "key", FINAL )
220            .build();
221        methodBuilder = getComposer().methodBuilder( "get" )
222            .addModifiers( PUBLIC, FINAL )
223            .addAnnotation( createSuppressWarningsAnnotation( getComposer(), UNLIKELY_ARG_TYPE ) )
224            .addAnnotation( Override.class )
225            .addParameter( arg0 )
226            .returns( Object.class )
227            .addJavadoc( inheritDocComment )
228            .addStatement( "$1T retValue = null", Object.class )
229            .addStatement( "final var supplier = $1N.get( $2N )", registry, arg0 )
230            .beginControlFlow(
231                """
232                if( nonNull( supplier) )
233                """ )
234            .addStaticImport( Objects.class, "nonNull" );
235        if( nonNull( lock) ) methodBuilder.beginControlFlow(
236            """
237            try( final var ignored = $N.lock() )
238            """, lock );
239        methodBuilder.addStatement( "retValue = supplier.get()" );
240        if( nonNull( lock ) ) methodBuilder.endControlFlow();
241        method = methodBuilder.endControlFlow()
242            .addCode( getComposer().createReturnStatement() )
243            .build();
244        addMethod( method );
245
246        method = getComposer().methodBuilder( "hashCode" )
247            .addModifiers( PUBLIC, FINAL )
248            .addAnnotation( Override.class )
249            .returns( INT )
250            .addJavadoc( inheritDocComment )
251            .addStatement( "return $1N.hashCode()", registry )
252            .build();
253        addMethod( method );
254
255        method = getComposer().methodBuilder( "isEmpty" )
256            .addModifiers( PUBLIC, FINAL )
257            .addAnnotation( Override.class )
258            .returns( BOOLEAN )
259            .addJavadoc( inheritDocComment )
260            .addStatement( "return $1N.isEmpty()", registry )
261            .build();
262        addMethod( method );
263
264        returnType = ParameterizedTypeName.from( Set.class, String.class );
265        method = getComposer().methodBuilder( "keySet" )
266            .addModifiers( PUBLIC, FINAL )
267            .addAnnotation( Override.class )
268            .returns( returnType )
269            .addJavadoc( inheritDocComment )
270            .addStatement( "return $N.keySet()", registry )
271            .build();
272        addMethod( method );
273
274        arg0 = getComposer().parameterBuilder( String.class, "key", FINAL )
275            .build();
276        method = getComposer().methodBuilder( "put" )
277            .addModifiers( PUBLIC, FINAL )
278            .addAnnotation( Override.class )
279            .addParameter( arg0 )
280            .addParameter( Object.class, "value", FINAL )
281            .returns( Object.class )
282            .addJavadoc( inheritDocComment )
283            .addCode( throwException )
284            .build();
285        addMethod( method );
286
287        final TypeName argType = ParameterizedTypeName.from( ClassName.from( Map.class ), WildcardTypeName.subtypeOf( String.class ), WildcardTypeName.subtypeOf( Object.class ) );
288        arg0 = getComposer().parameterBuilder( argType, "m", FINAL )
289            .build();
290        method = getComposer().methodBuilder( "putAll" )
291            .addModifiers( PUBLIC, FINAL )
292            .addAnnotation( Override.class )
293            .addParameter( arg0 )
294            .addJavadoc( inheritDocComment )
295            .addCode( throwException )
296            .build();
297        addMethod( method );
298
299        arg0 = getComposer().parameterBuilder( Object.class, "key", FINAL )
300            .build();
301        method = getComposer().methodBuilder( "remove" )
302            .addModifiers( PUBLIC, FINAL )
303            .addAnnotation( Override.class )
304            .addParameter( arg0 )
305            .returns( Object.class )
306            .addJavadoc( inheritDocComment )
307            .addCode( throwException )
308            .build();
309        addMethod( method );
310
311        method = getComposer().methodBuilder( "size" )
312            .addModifiers( PUBLIC, FINAL )
313            .addAnnotation( Override.class )
314            .returns( INT )
315            .addJavadoc( inheritDocComment )
316            .addStatement( "return $1N.size()", registry )
317            .build();
318        addMethod( method );
319
320        returnType = ParameterizedTypeName.from( Collection.class, Object.class );
321        methodBuilder = getComposer().methodBuilder( "values" )
322            .addModifiers( PUBLIC, FINAL )
323            .addAnnotation( Override.class )
324            .addAnnotation( createSuppressWarningsAnnotation( getComposer(), SIMPLIFY_STREAM_API_CALL_CHAIN ) )
325            .returns( returnType )
326            .addJavadoc( inheritDocComment )
327            .addStatement( "final $1T retValue", returnType );
328        if( nonNull( lock) ) methodBuilder.beginControlFlow(
329            """
330            try( final var ignored = $N.lock() )
331            """, lock );
332        methodBuilder.addStatement( """
333            retValue = $1N.values()
334                .stream()
335                .map( $2T::get )
336                .collect( toUnmodifiableList() )\
337            """, registry, Supplier.class )
338            .addStaticImport( Collectors.class, "toUnmodifiableList" );
339        if( nonNull( lock ) ) methodBuilder.endControlFlow();
340        method = methodBuilder.addCode( getComposer().createReturnStatement() )
341            .build();
342        addMethod( method );
343    }   //  build()
344}
345//  class MapImplementor
346
347/*
348 *  End of File
349 */
